( SELECT ROWNUM N, A.*,B.NICK FROM CONTENT A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON B.ID = A.M_ID ) C
WHERE C.N BETWEEN #{page} * 8 + 1 AND #{page} * 8 + 8
